fields.title: Innovation Waves, Harvesting Success
fields.name: MISA
fields.content: The Deep Seafood Group has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with MISA Saudi Arabia to invest in production plants and storage facilities across the Kingdom. This strategic partnership aims to significantly boost seafood production and streamline supply chain efficiency. By establishing these facilities, Deep Seafood Group seeks to expand its footprint in the region, ensuring a steady supply of high-quality seafood products. The collaboration is expected to enhance local seafood availability, stimulate economic growth, and foster innovation within Saudi Arabia's food industry, aligning with the Kingdom's vision for a sustainable and diversified economy.

fields.title: The Deep Seafood Group has Signed an investment agreement with Modon Saudi Arabia  26/06/2023
fields.name: MODON
fields.content: The Deep Seafood Company is pleased to announce the progression of two ongoing projects, underscoring our dedication to expansion and innovation in the seafood industry. Situated in the Jeddah Industrial Area and the Riyadh Sulaiha Industrial Area respectively, these projects signify a strategic investment in bolstering our capacity and maintaining our commitment to quality. In Jeddah, our ongoing project features a cutting-edge facility equipped with a 7000 metric ton capacity freezer room, alongside IQF cooking and breading lines. This facility is meticulously designed to meet the stringent standards of HACCP, ISO, BRC, FSSC, and EU, ensuring that our seafood products maintain their freshness and quality from sea to plate. Similarly, in Riyadh, our project encompasses a 4000 metric ton capacity freezer room and a spacious 60000 square feet buildup area, further solidifying our foothold in the region and facilitating our ability to cater to the growing demands of our diverse clientele. As we continue to forge ahead with these projects, The Deep Seafood Company remains steadfast in our commitment to delivering the finest seafood products while adhering to the highest standards of quality and food safety. We invite our customers to join us on this journey as we strive to redefine excellence in the seafood industry and uphold our reputation as a trusted provider of premium seafood products.

fields.title: Royal Future Unveils Groundbreaking Facility in Riyadh, Ushering a New Era of Industrial Excellence
fields.name: Riyadh KSA
fields.content: Riyadh, KSA Royal Future proudly announces the groundbreaking of its cutting-edge logistics facility in Riyadh, marking a new milestone in industrial excellence. Spanning 60,000 square feet, the MODON-approved facility features 4000 MT capacity freezer rooms and an advanced mobile pallet racking system, ensuring efficiency and scalability. Aligned with Vision 2030, this development strengthens Saudi Arabia s position as a global trade hub, driving innovation in cold chain logistics and industrial infrastructure.

fields.title: Gourmex: Unveils a New Era of Premium Meats and Poultry
fields.name: Gourmex
fields.content: The Deep Sea Company: We proudly introduce a new chapter of growth and excellence. With a focus on providing premium meats, including Wagyu beef, duck, turkey, chicken, and mutton, we cater to a wide range of establishments, from esteemed restaurants to luxurious hotels. Our dedication to delivering succulent meat experiences knows no bounds as we strive to captivate discerning palates with unparalleled delight. With a legacy spanning 37 years, our parental company maintains a steadfast commitment to delivering greatness to our clientele. Upholding this tradition, we pledge to continue providing unmatched quality meat that exceeds expectations. Gourmex sets ambitious goals for the future, envisioning a leadership role in the culinary landscape with our premium meats and poultry offerings. We prioritize sustainability and innovation, aiming to redefine gourmet dining experiences. Our mission revolves around ensuring uncompromising quality in every cut of meat, hand-selecting premium Wagyu, meat, and poultry for our customers. We are dedicated to surpassing expectations with exceptional service and ultimate customer satisfaction, staying true to our principles and core values

fields.title: The Deep Seafood Company Expands Presence with New Office in Kochi
fields.name: The Deep Sea Food Company
fields.content: Kochi, India February 14, 2025 The Deep Seafood Company proudly announces the grand opening of its new office in Kochi, reinforcing its commitment to expansion and excellence in the seafood industry. This new facility marks a significant milestone in the company s journey, enhancing operations, strengthening partnerships, and fostering innovation in the region. The inauguration event, held on February 14, 2025, at 10:30 AM, was a momentous occasion, celebrating growth, vision, and the company s dedication to serving global markets. With this expansion, The Deep Seafood Company continues to solidify its position as a leader in the seafood sector, ensuring the highest standards of quality and service worldwide.

fields.title: The Deep Seafood Company Featured in Khaleej Times!
fields.name: The Deep Seafood Company
fields.content:
We are proud to share that Khaleej Times has featured The Deep Seafood Company in a recent article, highlighting our journey, achievements, and future expansion plans. Founded in 1986 by Yoosuf Pangatt and Hamza Koya Kallan, The Deep Seafood Company has grown from a modest seafood business in Abu Dhabi into a global industry leader with operations in seven countries and a team of over 1,000 employees. As we celebrate our 39th anniversary, we continue to expand, with a new corporate HQ in the UAE and a state-of-the-art production facility set to open soon. The article also recognizes our commitment to sustainability, with MSC and ASC certifications, as well as food safety excellence through FSSC, EU, and USFDA approvals. With a portfolio of over 2,500 products, including fresh and frozen seafood, live seafood, and ready-to-eat specialties, we remain at the forefront of the industry. Our premium seafood brand, Oceano, and our Gourmex range of meat, poultry, and vegetables showcase our dedication to delivering high-quality products worldwide. As we prepare for Gulfood 2025 (February 17 23), we look forward to connecting with industry leaders, partners, and customers. We are honored to be featured in Khaleej Times and remain committed to shaping the future of the seafood and food industry. Read the full article here: https://www.khaleejtimes.com/kt-network/the-deep-seafood-company-celebrates-39-years-unveils-expansion-plans-and-new-premium-brands
Partner with one of the most trusted live and frozen seafood suppliers in UAE.

fields.title: Royal Future Inaugurates State-of-the-Art Seafood Warehouse in Riyadh
fields.name: The Deep Seafood Company
fields.content: Riyadh, KSA Royal Future proudly announces the grand inauguration of its new seafood warehouse in Riyadh, marking a significant step in its commitment to expanding reach and enhancing service. This cutting-edge facility strengthens Royal Future s ability to meet growing market demands with advanced cold storage solutions and efficient logistics infrastructure. The opening ceremony was a momentous occasion, attended by esteemed leadership and dedicated team members, celebrating a new chapter of growth and innovation. With this expansion, Royal Future continues to set new industry standards, reinforcing its position as a leader in global seafood distribution.

fields.title: The Deep Seafood Company Inaugurates New Corporate Office in Sharjah
fields.name: The Deep Seafood Company
fields.content: Sharjah, UAE The Deep Seafood Company proudly celebrated the inauguration of its new corporate office in Sharjah, UAE. This milestone event was graced by the Management, esteemed guests, company leaders, and dedicated team members. The state-of-the-art facility embodies its ongoing commitment to growth, innovation, and excellence in the seafood industry. Strategically designed to foster collaboration and operational efficiency, the new corporate office serves as a central hub for the company s regional and global activities. This expansion marks a significant step in strengthening it's position as a leader in the seafood market. With a relentless focus on delivering top quality products and services, the company continues to set benchmarks in the industry, catering to customers worldwide. This new chapter reflects the dedication to its vision of excellence, growth, and sustainable success.

fields.title: Ajman Chamber Officials Visit Deep Seafood Company
fields.name: Ajman Chamber Officials Visit
fields.content: Officials from the Ajman Chamber of Commerce recently visited the Deep Seafood Company to explore potential collaborations and gain insights into its operations. The visit included a comprehensive tour of the company's state-of-the-art facilities, highlighting our innovative production processes and commitment to quality. Discussions focused on fostering business relationships, enhancing trade opportunities, and supporting the local seafood industry. The visit underscores Ajman Chamber's dedication to promoting economic growth and strengthening ties with leading companies, aiming to boost regional commerce and contribute to the UAE's diversified economic development goals.

fields.title: The Importance of Sustainable Fishing Practices: How Your Choices Impact the Ocean
fields.name: Sustainable Fishing
fields.content:
The oceans are a vital part of our planet, providing a source of food, livelihoods, and biodiversity. However, the health of our oceans is increasingly threatened by unsustainable fishing practices. In this article, we explore the challenges of overfishing, the importance of sustainable fishing practices, the impact of consumer choices, and the benefits of adopting sustainable approaches to fishing.

The Challenges of Overfishing

Overfishing is a serious problem that endangers marine ecosystems around the world. The constant pursuit of fish stocks beyond their natural capacity depletes populations, alters marine feeding networks, and has the potential to cause fisheries to collapse. Unsustainable fishing activities, such as illegal fishing, bycatch, and destructive fishing methods, compound the issue by putting enormous strain on ocean ecosystems and risking marine life's future.

The Importance of Sustainable Fishing Practices

Overfishing is a pressing global issue that threatens the delicate balance of marine life. When fish are harvested at a rate that exceeds their ability to reproduce and replenish their populations, it can lead to the depletion of entire species. This not only disrupts the natural food chain but also has far-reaching consequences for the overall health of the ocean.

  1. Protects Marine Ecosystems: Sustainable fishing practices help protect the flora and fauna within marine environments, preserving the delicate balance of aquatic ecosystems. This ensures the long-term health and resilience of these ecosystems.

  2. Ensures Food Security and Livelihoods: Sustainable fishing practices support the livelihoods of fishermen and coastal communities that rely on seafood as a source of food and income. It helps maintain healthy fish populations to meet the global demand for protein-rich seafood.

  3. Prevents Overfishing and Stock Depletion: Sustainable fishing involves science-based management of fish stocks, setting catch limits, and implementing measures to prevent overfishing. This helps maintain fish populations at sustainable levels for the future.

  4. Reduces Environmental Impact: Sustainable fishing practices minimize the impact on habitats and non-target species, such as reducing bycatch and avoiding destructive fishing methods. This helps conserve marine biodiversity and reduce the overall environmental footprint of fishing activities.


The Impact of Consumer Choices

Consumer choices play a crucial role in driving the demand for sustainably sourced seafood. By making informed decisions about the seafood products we purchase and consume, we can support fisheries that adhere to sustainable fishing practices. Choosing seafood that is certified by reputable organizations can help promote responsible fishing practices and encourage the industry to prioritize sustainability. Consumers have the power to influence the market and drive positive change towards more sustainable fishing practices.

The Benefits of Sustainable Fishing

Adopting sustainable fishing practices provides numerous benefits to both the environment and the fishing business. Sustainable fisheries help to maintain healthy fish populations, preserve marine biodiversity, and safeguard key ecosystems. Sustainable fishing practices benefit fishermen and coastal communities by guaranteeing the long-term survival of fish stocks, thereby contributing to economic stability and food security. Sustainable fishing also helps to conserve marine species, build ecosystem resilience, and improve the general health of marine ecosystems.  

In conclusion, the importance of sustainable fishing practices cannot be overstated in the context of preserving the health and vitality of our oceans. Addressing the challenges of overfishing through sustainable practices is essential for ensuring the sustainability of fish populations and the well-being of marine ecosystems. 

By making conscious choices as consumers and supporting sustainable fisheries, we can contribute to the protection of marine biodiversity, the conservation of fish stocks, and the sustainability of coastal communities. Together, we can work towards a more sustainable future for our oceans, where responsible fishing practices and environmental stewardship are prioritized for the benefit of all.

fields.title: The Importance of Proper Seafood Handling and Storage: 10 Best Practices to Preserve Quality
fields.name: Seafood Handling and Storage
fields.content:
Seafood is a delicate and perishable food product that requires careful handling and storage to maintain its quality, freshness, and safety. Proper handling and storage practices are essential to prevent spoilage, maintain flavor, and ensure food safety. Here are 10 best practices to preserve the quality of seafood:


Temperature Control: Ensuring Optimal Conditions

Maintaining the correct temperature is paramount in preserving the quality of seafood. Seafood is highly perishable and susceptible to bacterial growth, especially in temperatures above 40 F (4 C). Therefore, it's essential to store seafood in refrigerators set at 32 F to 38 F (0 C to 3.3 C) or in freezers at 0 F (-18 C) or below.


Hygiene and Cleanliness: Preventing Contamination

Proper hygiene and cleanliness play a crucial role in seafood handling. It's imperative to wash hands, utensils, and surfaces thoroughly with hot, soapy water before and after handling seafood to prevent cross-contamination. Additionally, separate cutting boards should be used for raw seafood to avoid contaminating cooked foods.


Quick Chilling: Preserving Freshness

Immediately after catching seafood, it should be chilled promptly to maintain its freshness. Quick chilling slows down bacterial growth and enzymatic activity, preserving the seafood's quality. Ideally, seafood should be placed on a bed of ice in a shallow pan and stored in the refrigerator or cooler immediately.


Avoid Cross-Contamination: Separation is Key

Cross-contamination occurs when harmful bacteria from one food item are transferred to another. To prevent this, seafood should be stored separately from other foods, especially those that are ready-to-eat. Raw seafood should be kept on the bottom shelf of the refrigerator to prevent drips from contaminating other foods.


Proper Packaging: Sealing in Freshness

Proper packaging helps extend the shelf life of seafood by protecting it from exposure to air and moisture. Vacuum-sealed bags or airtight containers are ideal for storing seafood in the refrigerator or freezer. Additionally, wrapping seafood tightly in plastic wrap before refrigeration can help maintain its quality.


Use of Ice: Maintaining Cold Temperatures

Ice plays a crucial role in preserving seafood quality during transportation and storage. Surrounding seafood with ice or gel packs helps maintain cold temperatures, preventing bacterial growth and spoilage. When transporting seafood, it's essential to use insulated coolers to ensure that it remains chilled.


Storage in Refrigerator or Freezer: Extending Shelf Life

Proper storage is essential for extending the shelf life of seafood. In the refrigerator, seafood should be stored in the coldest part, typically the back of the bottom shelf. For longer-term storage, seafood can be frozen, but it's essential to package it properly to prevent freezer burn.


Regular Inspection: Monitoring for Spoilage

Regular inspection of seafood is vital for identifying signs of spoilage. Spoiled seafood may exhibit off-odors, slimy texture, or discoloration. If any of these signs are present, the seafood should be discarded immediately to prevent foodborne illness.


Labeling: Organizing and Identifying

Labeling seafood with the date of purchase or catch helps ensure proper rotation and prevents the consumption of expired seafood. Clear labeling also aids in organizing the refrigerator or freezer, making it easier to identify different types of seafood.


Rotation of Stock: FIFO and FEFO Methods

The FIFO (first in, first out) method should be employed when storing seafood to ensure that older products are used before newer ones. This practice helps minimize food waste and ensures that seafood is consumed at its peak freshness. This Practice is suitable for locally procured products.


The FEFO (First Expired, First Out) method is a crucial inventory management practice in the seafood industry. It ensures that the oldest products, those closest to their expiration date, are used or sold first. This practice is usually carried out for imported products


In conclusion, proper seafood handling and storage are essential for preserving quality and ensuring food safety. By following the 10 best practices outlined above, you can enjoy fresh, flavorful seafood while minimizing the risk of foodborne illness.
